attributes.action: get the  british troops out of afghanistan u r murdering innocent soldiers by keeping them there

attributes.background: our troops are fighting a never ending war in afghanistan too many young men and women been killed please dont kill anymore enough heart ache  has been brought to families please  sign this petition for our troops to b brought home
